articles.author: Todd Spangler
articles.title: Trump Says White House Will Host a UFC Championship Fight as Part of U.S.’s 250th Anniversary Celebration - Variety
articles.description: The White House will be home to a top-ranked UFC mixed martial arts fight in 2026 as part of the America 250 celebration, President Donald Trump said.
articles.content: In 2026, as part of festivities surrounding the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence, the White House will be home to a top-ranked UFC mixed martial arts fight, Preside… [+2539 chars]
